DOC.brief_title: Effect HCCD Supplemented With Omega-3 Fatty-Acids Inflammation Healthy , Overweight Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Atherosclerosis main cause premature morbidity mortality western world . It become evident one main cause development atherosclerosis presence low grade , internal inflammation . The inflammatory process lead endothelial dysfunction , early event pathogenesis atherosclerosis . The inflammatory process know induced several factor obesity , recur infection , smoking , sedentary lifestyle . It find weight reduction decrease sub clinical inflammation . It also find composition diet affect inflammatory process . Working hypothesis aim : Our preliminary result show high complex carbohydrate diet ( HCCD ) beneficial effect several marker inflammation . The aim study reinforce preliminary result measure effect HCCD additional marker inflammation ( TNFÎ± , IL6 ) endothelial dysfunction ( ICAM-1 , VCAM-1 ) , identify gene affect HCCD monocyte . In addition aim study determine whether consumption omega-3 oil actually increase anti-inflammatory effect obtain HCCD . Methods : 150 healthy overweight volunteer divide 2 group ; HCCD group HCCD supplement omega-3 fatty acid . Blood sample take follow overnight 12 hour fast , 8 week diet , follow analysis : total cell count , plasma lipid , glucose insulin , erythrocyte sedimentation rate , fibrinogen , white blood cell count , CRP . Markers leukocyte activation determine use FACS analysis . In addition , use ELISA , follow pro anti inflammatory cytokine marker endothelial dysfunction analyze : VCAM-1 ICAM-1 . Micro array analysis gene transcription difference induce HCCD perform monocyte use Affymetrix chip . Expected result : We assume HCCD consumption may improve inflammatory marker well marker endothelial dysfunction affect expression gene involve inflammation monocyte . In addition assume omega-3 fatty acid strengthen positive effect HCCD parameter inflammation . Importance probable implication Medicine : The result study may establish scientific basis guide people healthy lifestyle , include consumption diet compose component anti inflammatory effect , well nutritional supplement enhance anti-inflammatory property diet . This work also able establish influence diet supplementation gene expression inflammatory reaction monocyte .
